name: The Starman's Dream
description:
Drifting through the flanks of some far flung nebula, a Starship glints brightly as her burnished body catches reflecting light from the defunct moon-station she now orbits — cocooned inside her gleaming hull, the Starman sways gently; tethered within the confines of his padded cockpit he lies in slumber, fastened into his hammock, eyelids flickering: a vivid dream spills through his mind - sentient systems code the flux of the neurochemistry modulating his brain, feeding image files into the psychological evaluation database (PED) used for assessing the mental state of long-distance Star Pilots.

//

Image file 367 - Sequence 9 _D3
Dimensions - 2400 × 1600
17:05 - Dec 19th 3050 - Earth Time
Starship - ‘Atlas 36'
Pilot - A. Wells

Amalgamations of present time interstellar environment - appropriated by high levels of anxiety and isolation - represent the parameters for a reproduced dream-state of current environment.

[Recurrence of (Light Beings) in dream state - spore colonies still present within frontal recessed memory shelf - Biological reset failed - ‘Candy Coloured’ anomaly persists - ]

<<Follow up evaluation required >>

Written by Violent Crumble
